heroSection.name: Abdelrahman Magdy
heroSection.pragraph: I'm a frontend developer turning designs into living, breathing interfaces
heroSection.pragraph2: Smooth Fast Responsive Just like your users expect

text.about-pragraph: I'm a creative and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with a strong passion for crafting exceptional user experiences. I specialize in building high-performance, visually appealing, and fully responsive websites using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I have a sharp eye for design and a deep understanding of UI/UX principlesI'm a creative and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with a strong passion for crafting exceptional user experiences. I specialize in building high-performance, visually appealing, and fully responsive websites using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I have a sharp eye for design and a deep understanding of UI/UX principles

steper.step1_text: Welcome! I am here to help you and provide the best possible service. Follow the steps to learn how we can agree on the details
steper.step2_text: Message me directly on WhatsApp at
steper.step2_after_link: to explain your request in detail
steper.step3_text: After receiving your message, I will contact you on WhatsApp to confirm the details, price, and delivery time
steper.step4_text: Once we agree, I will start the work and then send you the final result via WhatsApp or any method you prefer
